about.title: About Me
about.description1: As a passionate TikTok creator, I specialize in creating engaging and viral content that resonates with my audience.
about.description2: With years of experience in content creation, I've built a strong community and successfully collaborated with various brands to create authentic and impactful content that drives results.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
content: Welcome to our Portfolio Website! This guide will help you navigate the site based on your device.
The website is fully responsive and optimized for both desktop and mobile viewing.
Key sections include: Home, About, Experience, Services, and Contact.

navigation.title: Navigation Guide
content: Desktop: Use the top navigation bar to access different sections. Hover over items for additional information.
Mobile: Tap the gear icon in the top-left corner to open the navigation menu. Swipe through sections or use the menu items.
Both devices: Use the language switcher and theme toggle in the top-right corner.
The documentation panel slides in from the right on desktop and from the left on mobile.

collaboration.title: Contact & Collaboration
content: Desktop: Navigate to the Contact section using the top navigation or scroll to the bottom.
Mobile: Access the Contact form through the menu or by scrolling to the end.
Fill out the collaboration form with your details and requirements.
Track your submission status through email notifications.
Manage ongoing collaborations through your dashboard.

features.title: Special Features
content: Desktop: Hover effects on navigation items and interactive elements.
Mobile: Smooth touch interactions and gesture-based navigation.
Dark/Light mode toggle for comfortable viewing on any device.
Bilingual support - switch between English and Indonesian.
Responsive images and content that adapt to your screen size.
Real-time status updates for collaboration requests.

help.needHelp: Need assistance? Contact us through the form or email directly. We're here to help on any device!
